definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]

sentences.english: The master bedroom of Room 318 had changed little since his stay 17 years earlier.
sentences.chinese: 318房的主臥室和他十七年前入住時相比變化不大。

sentences.english: A：Do you know when our governmental housing will be assigned?
sentences.chinese: 你知道政府福利房分配方案何時出臺嗎？

sentences.english: Please correctly connect the input connector clip of main power of the house.
sentences.chinese: 房體總電源進線插接件應正確聯接。

sentences.english: Yes, you have made a reservation of two deluxe rooms for two nights.
sentences.chinese: 是的，您訂了兩間奢華房，住兩晚。

sentences.english: No. You know how much it can cost to furnish an apartment?
sentences.chinese: 那不行。你知道添置一間房的傢俱得花多少錢？

sentences.english: The other side is also for sale.
sentences.chinese: 另一半連體房也一併出售。

sentences.english: It is in the DX community, Room 306, No.2 building.
"It was a torture room, " Kamel says.
sentences.chinese: 這曾是一間拷問房”卡邁爾說著。

sentences.english: Our instructor told us to keep the room locked .
sentences.chinese: 我們的教導員告訴我們把那間房鎖上。

sentences.english: Fang's wife drank the poison with no hesitation. The poisoned turned out to be a cup of vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 房的老婆毫不猶豫地把毒酒喝了，其實那這是一杯醋。

sentences.english: Of 3 patients who underwent aspirate corporis vitre hyponome combined with anterior chamber plasty. 3 eyes had failed.
sentences.chinese: 其中3例行抽吸玻璃體水囊聯合前房形成術失敗。

sentences.english: When do you need the room?
sentences.chinese: 您什麼時候需要這間房？

sentences.english: Conclusions Application of hyaluronan was helpful restore the anterior chamber and to improve the success of surgery.
sentences.chinese: 結論黏彈劑的應用促使前房恢復，提高手術成功率。

sentences.english: The 100 over-water bungalows perch on stilts above the turquoise lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 在100個水平房鱸魚上方的綠松石瀉湖高蹺。

sentences.english: This is a VIP room, it's cheaper than the deluxe room.
sentences.chinese: 這是一間貴賓房，比豪華房便宜一些。
